definition: to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
variant of 啟|启[qi3]
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
variant of 啟|启[qi3]
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: TXT in your Fraps folder, and into the benchmark directory if you have detailed statistics enabled.
sentences.chinese: 并到基准的目录，如果您有启用详细的统计资料。

sentences.english: Enable logons to the data store server.
sentences.chinese: 启用登陆到数据存储服务器。

sentences.english: The new Enel plant here opens its first boiler in two months.
sentences.chinese: 二个月后，埃奈尔电厂的第一个新锅炉将会启用。

sentences.english: You can re-enable them from layout configuration later.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在“布局配置”中重新启用它们。

sentences.english: Another possibility is that you have Vsync enabled.
sentences.chinese: 另一种可能性是，你已启用垂直同步。

sentences.english: Do not enable this setting on production servers.
sentences.chinese: 不要在生产服务器上启用该设置。

sentences.english: The use of emergent flood dispatching is under the conditions of the water level in Shashi Hydrological Station.
sentences.chinese: 启用非常调度方式是以沙市水位作为控制判定条件的。

sentences.english: Update and full-text indexing were also enabled.
sentences.chinese: 同时还启用了更新和全文索引。

sentences.english: What is the cause of the new airport-security rules for liquids ?
sentences.chinese: 启用新的机场液体安全条例的原因是什么？

sentences.english: A pop-up tip will tell you whether it is on or off.
sentences.chinese: 一个弹出提示会告诉你高亮是启用还是关闭了。

sentences.english: If noise reduction is enabled, an information bar will display in the report.
sentences.chinese: 如果启用降噪，会在报告中显示一个信息栏。

sentences.english: Returns whether or not the specified aspect ratio is enabled.
sentences.chinese: 返回是否指定的宽高比被启用。

sentences.english: Enable this option if you want to preserve the aspect ratio of image.
sentences.chinese: 启用此选项可保持图像宽高比。

sentences.english: It is up to the triggered program to re-enable triggering on the queue before exiting.
sentences.chinese: 已触发程序负责在退出前在队列上重新启用触发机制。

sentences.english: The display of the pop-ups trigger audio cues when enabled.
sentences.chinese: 启用后，显示弹出窗口的操作将触发声音提示。

sentences.english: If you activate this option, sub-folders are displayed on their own.
sentences.chinese: 如果您启用此选项，这些子文件夹会单独显示。

definition: to add to existing facilities or services
to draw into/to pull into/to introduce
formal/official
to establish/to build
as the time draws near/at the last moment/temporary/interim/ad hoc
to start (a machine)/(fig.) to set in motion/to launch (an operation)/to activate (a plan)
to set up/to install
to stop using/to abandon/abandoned/deprecated
to put into effect/to carry out
open-minded
to open up (windows for air, ideas for discussion, transportation routes etc)
when the time comes/at the scheduled time
to change into
to put in place/to put into practice/to take effect
according to reports/it is reported (that)
to enter and garrison/(fig.) to establish a presence in
to try out/to test
